contraband_detector.name: Contraband Detector
contraband_detector.description: Hit a player with this to check if they have swords, grenades, or flashbangs.

sturdy_handcuffs.name: Sturdy Handcuffs
sturdy_handcuffs.description: You can jail players at 5 HP higher than usual.

bulky_physique.name: Bulky Physique
bulky_physique.description: You get an additional 4 maximum health.

melon_squeeze.name: Melon Squeeze
melon_squeeze.description: You get an extra melon per melon.

purification_methods.name: Purification Methods
purification_methods.description: You have a 50% chance to gain extra gold when selling.
